2082160.name: BEAUTY AND THE BEAST
2082160.description:
As a person who stumbles into a mysterious residence, you find yourself uncovering the owner's tragic history while learning how you fit into this story about love, redemption, and hope.

Explore, decipher, and unlock more of your environment and its many secrets.

Features

  • Beautiful atmospheric environments to explore and discover
  • Unravel the mystery of the Beast's emotive backstory through personal journals and memoirs
  • Examine important items up close and decipher their connection to the story
  • Solve simple navigation puzzles as you explore the many rooms of the Beast's residence
  • Fluid and elegant controls and gameplay
2082160.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
